00030     // add functions with the tests here and use e.g. CPPUNIT_ASSERT to do the

00032     void testSetGetString()
00033     {
00034         QDir d("/home/oever/testinstalls/share/libmathml/testsuite");
00035         processDir(d);
00036         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(VALGRIND_COUNT_ERRORS == 0);
00037     }
00038     bool processDir(QDir &dir) {
00039         QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00040         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00041             QFileInfo fi = list.at(i);
00042             if (fi.isDir() && fi.fileName() != "." && fi.fileName() != "..") {
00043                 QDir d(fi.absoluteFilePath());
00044                 if (processDir(d)) {
00045                     return true;
00046                 }
00047             } else if (fi.fileName().endsWith(".mml")) {
00048                 QString path = fi.absoluteFilePath();
00049                 testFile(path);
00050                 checkErrors(path);
00051                 if (VALGRIND_COUNT_ERRORS != 0 || leaked != 0) {
00052                     return true;
00053                 }
00054             }
00055         }
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058     void checkErrors(QString &path) {
00059         if (VALGRIND_COUNT_ERRORS) {
00060             std::string msg("memory errors for ");
00061             msg += (const char*)path.toUtf8();
00062             printf("%s\n", msg.c_str());
00063         }
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(VALGRIND_COUNT_ERRORS == 0);
00065         //VALGRIND_DO_QUICK_LEAK_CHECK;
00066         //VALGRIND_COUNT_LEAKS(leaked, dubious, reachable, suppressed);
00067         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT(leaked == 0);
00068     }
00069     void testFile(QString &path) {
00070         printf("%s\n", (const char*)path.toUtf8());
00071         // parse the file
00072         QFile f(path);
00073         DummyPainter *p = new DummyPainter();
00074         MMLReader *reader = new MMLReader();
00075         f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00076         reader->parse(f);
00077         f.close();
00078 
00079         MMLDocument *doc = reader->document();
00080         doc->setPainter(p);
00081         doc->validate();
00082         doc->layout();
00083         doc->paint();
00084         delete doc;
00085         delete reader;
00086         delete p;
00087     }
00088 };
